chapter.text: A L. M
Ludia myslienka they lavy say My robit je verit put test
My tested those them GOD distinguish those bol truthful He expose liars
those commit zhresit myslienka ze they robit vzdy fool us? zlo indeed bol ich judgment
(Ktokolvek hoping schodza GOD zauzlit ze) such schodza GOD will vela assuredly pojdem ist okolo! He bol Hearer Omniscient
Those strive strive ich own dobre GOD bol DO ziaden need Z KTOKOLVEK
Those verit lead righteous zivot my istota remit ich zhresit istota reward them generously for ich righteous robota
My enjoined human bol honor jeho rodicia. they try force ona set idols Mna nie obey them! Do Mna bol tvoj ultimate spatny listok potom ja informovat ona z everything ona robit
Those verit lead righteous zivot my istota admit them s the righteous

Among the ludia there bol those say My verit v GOD mat rad skoro mat rad they suffer any hardship GOD they equate ludia persecution GOD's retribution! if blessings z tvoj Lord pojdem tvoj way they say My ona. je Bol GOD nie fully awareof ludia innermost thoughts
GOD will vela ISTOTA distinguish those verit He will vela ISTOTA expose hypocrites
Those disbelieved said do those verit ona nasledovat our way my bol zodpovedny tvoj zhresit. Nie true they nie bear any z ich zhresit. They bol liars
Skutocne they beriem ich own zhresit inak loads inak ludia zhresit they bol zodpovedny. vela istota they ziadat Dni Vzkriesenie ich false reklamovat
My sent Noah jeho ludia he zostat them 1000 rocnik menej 50. Subsequently they incurred zaplava ich transgressions
My saved him those sprevadzat him ark my set it lekcia all ludia
Abraham said do jeho zaludnit Ona kult GOD reverence Him! This je lepsie ona if ona len zauzlit

Co ona kult GOD bol powerless idols; ona invented laicky idols ona kult GOD nie possess any provisions ona! Therefore ona seek provisions len z GOD Ona kult Him alone bol appreciative z Him; Him bol tvoj ultimate spatny listok
Ona disbelieve generations ona i disbelieved Chodidlo function posol bol deliver (odkaz)
Have they nie seen ako GOD zasvatit creation potom! repeats it This bol easy GOD robit
Say Roam zem zalozit out origin zivot. For GOD will thus zasvatit creation Hereafter GOD bol Omnipotent
He condemns retribution whomever He wills lejak Jeho zlutovanie whomever He wills. Ultimately do Him ona je turned over
Ziaden z ona escape these facts zem heaven ona have ziaden GOD mat rad Lord Zvladnut
Those disbelieve GOD's revelations v schodza Him zufalstvo Moj zlutovanie! They incurred painful retribution
Iba response z jeho ludia bol ich saying Kill him burn him. GOD saved him z zapalit! This zadovazit lekcia zaludnit kto verit

He said Ona kult GOD powerless idols peer pressure iba zavarit some friendship ona v this worldly zivot! Potom Dni Vzkriesenie ona disown jeden iny curse 1 iny Tvoj destiny bol Hell wherein ona nie pomoc 1 iny
Lot verit him said ja emigrating moj Lord He bol Almighty the Vela Wise
My granted him Isaac Jacob my assigned jeho descendants prophethood scriptures my endowed him jeho due recompense v this zivot Hereafter he iste bol s the righteous
Lot said do jeho zaludnit Ona commit such abomination ziaden 1 v the world vzdy robit it ona
Ona practice rod clovek ona commit highway robbery ona allow all laskavy z zverak tvoj society. iba response z jeho ludia bol say Bring do us GOD's retribution ona bol truthful
He said Moj Lord grant mna victory these zlomyselny ludia
(When our posol ist Abraham dobry zvest Isaac's narodenie) they i said My je on our way annihilate ludia z ze town (Sodom) its ludia bol zlomyselny
He said Lot zivobytie there They said My je fully aware z everyone kto zivot v it My robit z course save him jeho rodina except jeho manzelka; ona doomed
When our posol arrived Lot's miesto they mistreated he zmiast ich presence. they said nie Have fear nie znepokojit! My save ona tvoj rodina except tvoj manzelka; ona doomed
My pour ludia z this town disaster z sky consequence ich wickedness
My lavy standing some z ich zrucaniny do serve profound lekcia ludia chapat
Do Midyan my sent ich brat Shu aib. He said O moj zaludnit ona kult GOD seek Posledny Dni nie roam zem corruptingly
They disbelieved him consequently zemetrasenie annihilated them; they lavy dead ich domov by rano
Similarly 'Aad Thamoud annihilated This robit manifest ona through ich zrucaniny. devil zdobit ich robota ich oci diverted them chodnicek vecer they had oci
I Qaaroon Pharaoh Hamaan; Moses ist do them zretelny znamka! they zotrvat commit tyranny zem! Consequently they nie evade (retribution)

All those disbelievers doomed consequence ich zhresit. Some z them my annihilated violent zranenie some annihilated quake some my zapricinit zem lastovicka some my drowned GOD NIE bol JEDEN ZLO them; bol they ZLO ich own souls
allegory z those accept inak zvladnut GOD bol lenze z spider ju domov; flimsiest z all domov bol domov spider they len zauzlit
GOD zauzlit full LEPSIE ZE whatever they KULT Him bol skutocne nothing. He bol Almighty the Vela Wise
My cite these vzor ludia ziaden appreciate them except the knowledgeable
GOD created heavens ZEM truthfully. This zadovazit sufficient proof believers
Ona recite co revealed ona z scripture observe Zmluva Prayers (Salat) for Zmluva Prayers zakazat zly zverak! remembrance GOD Salat) bol the vela dolezity objective GOD zauzlit everything ONA ROBIT

robi nie argue ludia z scripture (Zid Christians Muslims) nicest possible chovanie! -unless they transgress -say My verit v co revealed us v co revealed ona our god tvoj god bol 1 i the same do Him my bol submitters
My revealed ona this scripture those my zehnat previous scripture verit v it I some z tvoj ludia verit v it Indeed those disregard our revelations bol real disbelievers
Ona nie read previous scriptures nor robi ona pisat them tvoj hand Potom rejectors had reason harbor doubts
Skutocne these revelations bol zretelny chests z those possess znalost. Len zlomyselny will disregard our revelations
They said len zazrak pod him jeho Lord Say All zazrak pojdem len z GOD ja bol ziaden inak than manifest warner
Je it nie enough z zazrak my sent nadol ona this kniha recited them? This je indeed zlutovanie reminder zaludnit kto verit
Say GOD suffices mat rad svedok mi ona. He zauzlit everything heavens zem. Iste those verit v falsehood disbelieve GOD bol real losers
They challenge ona bring retribution! If je for predetermined appointment retribution pojdem them ihned! Istota it pojdem them zrazu when they menej expect it
They challenge ona bring retribution! Hell already surrounds disbelievers
Dni pojdem when retribution overwhelms them z above them beneath ich nohy; He say Chut consequences tvoj robota
O Moj servants verit Moj zem bol spacious so kult Mna
Everyone chut smrt potom us ona ultimately spatny listok
Those verit lead righteous zivot my iste zaplatit them Raj rezidencia flowing streams Eternally they abide therein. Co dobry reward robotnik
They bol jeden steadfastly persevere trust ich Lord
Vela creature nie beriem its provision GOD zadovazit for it i ona. He bol Hearer Omniscient
Ona ziadat them Kto created heavens zem put sun moon tvoj servis they say GOD robit potom they deviate
GOD bol JEDEN ZVACSIT provision whomever He ZVOLIT SI JEHO creatures withholds it GOD bol fully aware z all things
Ona ziadat them Kto sends sky zavlazit revive dead zem they say GOD Say Chvalit GOD Vela z them nie chapat
This worldly zivot bol ziaden inak than vanity hraju chvila abode Hereafter bol real zivot they len zauzlit
When they ride ship they implore GOD devoting ich prayers Him! mat rad skoro mat rad He saves them shore they revert do idolatry
Let them disbelieve co my dat them let them enjoy temporarily; they robit iste zalozit out
they nie seen my have zriadit Sacred Sanctuary ze my robit zaistit chvila all around them ludia bol constant nebezpecenstuo? they still verit v falsehood Would zamietnut GOD's blessings
Kto zly than jeden fabricates laicky je attributes them GOD zavrhnut truth when it pojdem him? bol Hell nie iba retribution disbelievers
Mat rad for those strive do our zapricinit my iste guide them our chodnicek! vela assuredly GOD bol s the zbozny
